title: Lynda - Managing Project Quality with Bob McGannon

Ensure you're producing results that meet the needs of stakeholders, by incorporating the four major indicators of qualityÃ¢â‚¬â€function, outputs, performance, and reliabilityÃ¢â‚¬â€into your project planning. In this course, author and PMP Bob McGannon walks you through the considerations for making sure your project quality is spot on. Discover how to plan for quality, perform testing, and take into account special needs for IT projects.

This course qualifies for 1.25 Category A professional development units (PDUs) through lynda.com, PMI Registered Education Provider #4101.

[image=zyW8Z6LqSj]

Topics include:

    What is project quality?
    Using Pareto analysis and Lean Six Sigma
    Balancing quality, project workload, and customer needs
    Addressing quality issues
    Planning IT tests
    Testing deliverables
